caption: Parc de Choisy is a charming urban park located in the 13th arrondissement of Paris. Spanning over 4.3 hectares, it serves as a verdant escape for both locals and visitors. Known for its lush greenery, varied recreational facilities, and historical significance, Parc de Choisy offers a delightful mix of natural beauty and community-oriented spaces.  **History:** Parc de Choisy was inaugurated in 1937 as part of a broader initiative to enhance green spaces in Paris. This was during a period when urban planners aimed to provide more recreational areas for the city‚Äôs rapidly growing population. The park's design reflects the style of the early 20th century, with its formal gardens, expansive lawns, and strategically placed sculptures.  **Landscape and Design:** The park features a diverse array of landscapes, from meticulously manicured flower beds to more natural, wooded areas. Central to its design is a large, open lawn that provides ample space for picnics and leisure activities. Surrounding this are winding paths shaded by mature trees, creating a serene environment ideal for walking or jogging.  Key elements of the park include: - **The Central Fountain:** A striking water feature that serves as a focal point, surrounded by colorful flower beds and benches for relaxation. - **Playgrounds and Sports Facilities:** Parc de Choisy is well-equipped for active recreation, boasting several playgrounds, a basketball court, and a football field. These amenities make it a popular spot for families and sports enthusiasts. - **Sculptures and Monuments:** Scattered throughout the park are various sculptures and monuments, adding a cultural and historical layer to the green space. Notably, there is a monument dedicated to Henri Sellier, a notable urban planner and politician.  **Flora and Fauna:** The park is home to a variety of plant species, both native and exotic. Seasonal flowers, shrubs, and tall trees create a vibrant and ever-changing tapestry of colors. Birdwatchers will appreciate the diverse avian population, attracted by the park's naturalistic environment.  **Community and Activities:** Parc de Choisy is a hub of community activity. Throughout the year, it hosts numerous events, from open-air concerts and fitness classes to cultural festivals. The park's layout facilitates both organized events and informal gatherings, making it a versatile space for social interaction.  **Accessibility:** Conveniently located near several metro stations, Parc de Choisy is easily accessible from different parts of Paris. Its well-maintained paths ensure it is accessible to individuals with mobility issues.  **Conclusion:** Parc de Choisy is a testament to the importance of urban green spaces. It beautifully combines historical significance, recreational facilities, and natural beauty, making it a cherished part of the 13th arrondissement. Whether you are looking to relax, exercise, or partake in community events, Parc de Choisy offers something for everyone.
Great place for everyone. Grown ups have benches and grass to chill. Children have a great playground. And you will find sunny and shaded places depending of your taste.

A very beautiful park large enough to practice various sports or just to walk around! It was possible to watch the opening ceremony of the Paralympic Games in August 2024 on a large screen which was installed in front of one of the lawns
Nice park, very pleasant. With a baby you can relax in peace and on the lawn.

This park is great and very relaxing despite all the traffic around it. The fountains rock with their jet of water and the grass green enough to rest on. The air is fresh and we find the decompression and relaxation we seek.
This is a fairly spacious park with a large children's play area, ping pong tables and plenty of trees for shade.
It is a large park often occupied by many families. It is difficult to find seats there

Choisy Park is one of my favorite Parisian parks! And by far a must-see place in the 13th arrondissement.  It is very large, with lawns, several benches, picnic tables, city stadium...  In spring the cherry blossoms bloom on one side of the park, and it's magnificent!
Very beautiful supervised park, the lawn is green and clean you can lie down. We see groups of friends playing sports or playing cards‚Ä¶ There are water points and a park for children.
The Choisy park is vast and offers many nice areas for a picnic, play areas and a terrace with games for children.  The water fountain adds a nice touch.  I highly recommend this place.
Nice park with a pool and water jet.  A small circus üé™ occupies a space.  Very classic and nothing special to note... except that this park is dedicated to the victims of Rouanda. ‚Ä¶

Green stop at the foot of the towers, lawns and small paths typical of French parks. No extravagance but beautiful plants and flowers scattered over its entire surface as well as a shared garden, little relief but a clear view of the neighborhood, and a park which breathes, especially in spring and summer, a gentle tranquility, the one that makes you take your time on its benches, to come and snack there, sunbathe on the grass, chat or take a nap. There is a children's carousel, a small Guignol theater, as well as a caf√© in the shade of its parasols and its trees, all very pleasant not far from its central pool from which a few jets emerge. of water. Small gentle break before continuing to wander around the 13th.

I love this Parisian park! It is very lively and many people come to practice a sporting activity there. Its ideal location in the 13th arrondissement means that I stop there often, with pleasure üåü ‚Ä¶

Great park to have a good time with the family, offering a lot of activities, in summer there are plenty of children's games with snack bars allowing parents and children to eat during the day. The park is very well maintained. It presents a beautiful diversity of flora. Accessible for people with reduced mobility, offers a peaceful setting in the middle of the Parisian jungle.
Very nice park with benches. There is a basketball court and even outdoor Ping Pong tables.
Very quiet, vast park, with lots of benches in the shade where it is pleasant to sit. Sports facilities available (table tennis, basketball).
Very lively park and ideal for stopping for a banh mi or a takeaway bubble tea üßã There are many benches but you can also come and lie down in the grass! Ideal for your best dates! ‚Ä¶

Very beautiful, well-maintained park with a splendid kindergarten. There is also a sports circuit, table tennis tables.
A perfect place to play with children, with a carousel, a puppet theater (Les guignols de Paname) sports machines, ping pong tables and a caf√©. I've gerne post to learn to come and roller skate.
Well decorated for the Olympic games, and pretty water jets.
Beautiful, well-maintained neighborhood park, good space for children and a spot for sports enthusiasts.  Very nice lots of shadows especially with this heat!!

A green break, a relaxed Olympic fan zone welcome. Nice break
